REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0566 reute h f BC-ROCHESTER-TELEPHONE-< 03-11 0049

TEXT.TITLE: ROCHESTER TELEPHONE <RTC> TO BUY CANTON PHONE
TEXT.BODY: Rochester Telephone Corp said it agreed to buy <Canton Telephone Co> for undisclosed terms. Canton serves customers in northeastern Penn. In 1986, it had operating revenues of about 1.3 mln dlrs, the company said. Reuter
